import{queryAllByAltText}from'@testing-library/react';import axios from'axios';export const fetchSearchResults=async(query,page,sort)=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://52.78.206.96:5000/search/".concat(query,"?page=").concat(page,"&sort=").concat(sort));return response.data;}catch(error){throw new Error('Failed to fetch search results');}};export const fetchKeword=async query=>{// 추천 검색어 요청해서 받아오기\
try{const response=await axios.get("http://52.78.206.96:5000/keword/".concat(query));return response.data.result[0].items.concat(response.data.result[1].items);}catch(error){throw new Error('Failed to fetch keword results');}};
